queryFailed_VQDisabled.title: You cannot run a volume query on this platform.

multipleRoots: Be careful only the first root will be used to compute the volume
badProximityInput: Query failed : wrong proximity input object
proximityOnAssembly: Proximity is only supported for shape
proximityOnMultisel: Proximity is only supported for single selection
wrongSelection: Wrong selection : please select an object part of the structure
authoringModeOn: An authoring operation has been performed, volume query might not be up to date
includeBorderObjects: Volume query uses indexation techniques that do not enable accurate discrimination of actual results among border objects
minValueAlertTooltipHelp: The minimum value cannot be greater than the maximum value
maxValueAlertTooltipHelp: The maximum value cannot be lower than the minimum value
